resources.string: Write a comment to the developer

I m a student from France and I just want you to know I have done all of this only to improve my knowledge about how to do an android application. If you have any comments or any observation, please use the comment part in the menu and I will be directly informed. Cheers !
Can t get the correct number.
No phone number for this contact.
You have to put a correct number for the number of messages to send.
You have to put a correct phone number.
You have to write something in the message.
Your are limited with 5 messages with this version.
